languages.text: "Я услышал{mf||а} достаточно. Паскаль — разберись, что это за сущность. До тех пор Номос могут продолжать жить на корабле".

traits.locale_text: "Я услышал{mf||а} достаточно. Паскаль — разберись, что это за сущность. До тех пор Номос может продолжать жить на корабле".

languages.text: "I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."
languages.original_text: "Я услышал{mf||а} достаточно. Паскаль — разберись, что это за сущность. До тех пор Номос могут продолжать жить на корабле".

traits.locale_text: "I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."
"I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."
"I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."
"I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."
"I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."

languages.text: 「もうたくさんだ。パスカル、お前はこの存在の性質を調べてくれ。真実が分かるまでは、ノモスがこの船に存在することを許可する」
languages.original_text: "I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."

traits.locale_text: 「もうたくさんだ。パスカル、お前はこの存在の性質を調べてくれ。真実が分かるまでは、ノモスがこの船に存在することを許可する」

languages.text: “我已经明白了。帕斯卡，你负责调查这个实体的本质。在我们得知真相之前，诺莫斯可以继续留在飞船上。”
languages.original_text: "I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."

traits.locale_text: “我已经明白了。帕斯卡，你负责调查这个实体的本质。在我们得知真相之前，诺莫斯可以继续留在飞船上。”

languages.text: "Ich habe genug gehört. Pasqal, untersucht das Wesen dieser Entität. Bis wir die Wahrheit kennen, darf Nomos auf dem Schiff nicht existieren."
languages.original_text: "I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe genug gehört. Pasqal, untersucht das Wesen dieser Entität. Bis wir die Wahrheit kennen, darf Nomos auf dem Schiff nicht existieren."

languages.text: « J'en ai assez entendu. Pasqal, vous allez étudier la nature de cette entité. Jusqu'à ce que nous connaissions la vérité, Nomos est autorisé à exister sur le vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai assez entendu. Pasqal, vous allez étudier la nature de cette entité. Jusqu'à ce que nous connaissions la vérité, Nomos est autorisé à exister sur le vaisseau. »

languages.text: «Ya he oído suficiente. Pasqal, le encomiendo que investigue la naturaleza de esta entidad. Hasta que sepamos la verdad, Nomos podrá existir en la nave».
languages.original_text: "I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."

traits.locale_text: «Ya he oído suficiente. Pasqal, le encomiendo que investigue la naturaleza de esta entidad. Hasta que sepamos la verdad, Nomos podrá existir en la nave».

languages.text: "Yeterince işittim. Pasqal, bu varlığın doğasını araştırmakla yükümlüsün. Hakikati öğrenene dek Nomos, gemideki varlığını sürdürecek."
languages.original_text: "I've heard enough. Pasqal, you are to investigate the nature of this entity. Until we know the truth, Nomos is allowed to exist on the ship."

traits.locale_text: "Yeterince işittim. Pasqal, bu varlığın doğasını araştırmakla yükümlüsün. Hakikati öğrenene dek Nomos gemideki varlığını sürdürecek."
